If you have any questions about any of the cards, feel free to PM me.

Otto Knabe - Sweet Caporal 350/30 - PSA 3 - $40 - SOLD
Bill Bergen - Piedmont 150/25 -  SGC 40 - $40 - pending
Joe Doyle - Sovereign 350 - SGC 30 - $250  Tough front/back combo - SOLD

Thanks

Jantz

I'll take the second Doc Adkins [the one to the right].
Email me your paypal address; thanks.

Doug
